data.text:
Huginnin Cove Campground

Isle Royale National Park, Near Hovland, Michigan

Huginnin Cove Campground does not offer reservations through Recreation.gov. Please take a look at the area details below for more information about visiting this location. Enjoy your visit!

Overview

Huginnin Cove Campground is located at Huginnin Cove, on the north shore of Isle Royale National Park, off of the West and East Huginnin Cove Trails. Stay Limit: 3 consecutive nights from June 1 â Labor Day annually. Access: Foot/canoe/kayak access. No dock available for boats.
